original_title: NJPW The New Beginning In Sapporo 2020 - Night 2
overview: The New Beginning in Sapporo (2020) was a professional wrestling event promoted by New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW). It took place on February 1 and 2, 2020 at the Hokkaido Prefectural Sports Center in Sapporo, Japan.
title: NJPW The New Beginning In Sapporo 2020 - Night 2
